participant_1.background:
I had to learn to adapt to a new way of life after my farm was foreclosed.
i paint organic scenes with pretty trees.
I bought myself a new outfit to look nice and attract a potential partner.
I am happy and healthy at my current weight.
I am clumsy, but I make up for it with my cooking skills.

participant_2.background:
I love to go to concerts with my friends because we can all sing and dance along.
I like to use my George Foreman grill to cook healthy meals.
i love reading.
my favorite food is cheese.
My most valued material possession is my stethoscope

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
I'm doing pretty well! I just bought a new outfit to look nice and attract a potential partner.
That's awesome! I hope it works out! Are you going on any dates soon?
Not yet, but I'm hoping to soon! I'm excited to meet someone new.
I'm sure you'll find someone great! What are you looking for in a partner?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, funny, and intelligent. I'd also like someone who is into the same things I am, like painting and cooking.
That sounds like a great list! I'm sure you'll find someone perfect for you.
What do you do for fun?
I love to paint, cook, and go to concerts. I also love to read.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to read and go to concerts too.
That's awesome! What are some of your favorite books and bands?
I love to read anything by Jane Austen, and I'm a big fan of the Beatles.
I love Jane Austen too! And the Beatles are great!
